Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 37th overall pick, by Ashburn in 1966...
Injured on 7/13/1970 with a Bruised Hand, out for 2 days...
Had first career hit (triple) on 4/2/1974, off Robert Holland (PEN)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/6/1974, off Gregory Crandall (PIL)...
Injured on 8/19/1976 with a Strained Posterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 5-6 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Wisconsin on 2/3/1981 to a 2-year deal worth $1,250,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Longport on 3/1/1983 to a minor league contract.
